column4: ok ubuntu geniuses, I've got a challenge for you. "/dev/sdc is apparently in use by the system; will not make a filesystem here!" but it's not mounted or in use
sde1. that's the drive my system is installed on
then i don't see why an   sudo eject /dev/sd?    wont work.
hmmmm    sudo fdisk -l    and see if the system even recgnizes an sdc
and scd1 is where the system lives ?
this problem started yesterday. I took the drive out and did a full format overnight in windows and it worked fine
here's a question. this motherboard is new. would ubuntu have issues with me setting my sata controller to AHCI?
i don't get it tho because it sees the drives and lets me partition them
let me hand you off to someone that has had some experance with this sort of issue.   all my hardware is older stuff.  and i really don't know what else to do there.
ok thanks a lot. do you know someone in particular or just anybody reading along?
